caption.p: Cyclic voltammograms of 100 mM [Ln(NTf 2) 3] in DHOA medium recorded at glassy carbon working electrode at the scan rate of 50 mV s −1 at 353 K. Insets show the photographs of the electrodeposits obtained at the working electrode after electrolysis of 100 mM Ln 3+ in the system DHOA/[bmim][NTf 2] at −3.0 V for about 2 h. Reproduced with permission from [ 36], copyright 2020, Elsevier.
